Class AuthController

java.lang.Object
controllers.AuthController
public class AuthController extends Object
Authentication controller, manages the user access and validations

    • isValidName

      public static boolean isValidName(String name)
      Checks that the name sent is within the given pattern. It must not contain any numbers or special characters.
      Parameters:
      name - The data that will be validated
      Returns:
      Returns false if it is out of the pattern and true if it is in

    • isValidEmail

      public static boolean isValidEmail(String email)
      Checks that the email sent is within the given pattern. Can contain lowercase and/or uppercase letters, numbers. Must contain one '@' character, one '.' character followed by at least two letters.
      Parameters:
      email - The data that will be validated
      Returns:
      Returns false if it is out of the pattern and true if it is in

    • isValidPassword

      public static boolean isValidPassword(String password)
      Checks that the password sent is within the given pattern. Must contain uppercase and lowercase letters, a number and a special character. It must have a minimum of 8 and a maximum of 20 characters.
      Parameters:
      password - The data that will be validated
      Returns:
      Returns false if it is out of the pattern and true if it is in

    • isValidPhone

      public static boolean isValidPhone(String phone)
      Checks that the phone number sent is within the given pattern. Must contain only numbers. It must have a minimum of 10 and a maximum of 11 characters.
      Parameters:
      phone - The data that will be validated
      Returns:
      Returns false if it is out of the pattern and true if it is in

    • isValidAddress

      public static boolean isValidAddress(String address)
      Checks that the address sent is within the given pattern. May contain letters and numbers, no special characters, except commas and dashes.
      Parameters:
      address - The data that will be validated
      Returns:
      Returns false if it is out of the pattern and true if it is in

    • isValidCPF

      public static boolean isValidCPF(String cpf)
      Checks that the cpf sent is within the given pattern. It must contain only numbers and be 11 characters in length.
      Parameters:
      cpf - The data that will be validated
      Returns:
      Returns false if it is out of the pattern and true if it is in

    • isValidGratuityOption

      public static boolean isValidGratuityOption(String gratuityOption)
      Checks that the gratuity option has been selected.
      Parameters:
      gratuityOption - The data that will be validated
      Returns:
      Returns false if it is out of the pattern and true if it is in

    • isValidCNPJ

      public static boolean isValidCNPJ(String cnpj)
      Checks that the cpnj sent is within the given pattern. It must contain only numbers and be 14 characters in length.
      Parameters:
      cnpj - The data that will be validated
      Returns:
      Returns false if it is out of the pattern and true if it is in

    • isValidCorporateName

      public static boolean isValidCorporateName(String corporateName)

      Parameters:
      corporateName - The data that will be validated
      Returns:
      Returns false if it is out of the pattern and true if it is in
